pages.text: $(li)The Shepherd is a master of the $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/wool)Wool$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will trade you Wool Blocks, Wool Carpets, $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/beds)Beds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/banners)Banners$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/paintings)Paintings$(/l). $(br)$(li)A Villager can get the Shepherd profession if is near a $(l:patchouli:decoration/alexsmobs/banner_patterns)Loom$(/l).
